    Modify row column.
    void
    registerData()
    Register data is a function called at the end and takes data like username of the User, total score and writes them into the EndGameController Labels, it also uses Statistic to make statistics and write them into the .json file.
    private void
    setBackground()
    set the background, using an mp4 file, so we don't need to use a MusicController, that is under the Labels.
    private void
    writeOnGrid()
    Write on grid is a Method used to write the statistic into the grid cells, modifying the text of the Labels took from the FXML

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init​(GameModel game)
      Inits the EndGame.
      Parameters:
      game - the game

    • registerData

      public void registerData()
      Register data is a function called at the end and takes data like username of the User, total score and writes them into the EndGameController Labels, it also uses Statistic to make statistics and write them into the .json file.

    • setBackground

      private void setBackground()
      set the background, using an mp4 file, so we don't need to use a MusicController, that is under the Labels.

    • writeOnGrid

      private void writeOnGrid()
      Write on grid is a Method used to write the statistic into the grid cells, modifying the text of the Labels took from the FXML

    • modifyRowColumn

      row - the row
      column - the column
